src:
美團點評變紅底股見100蚊！追揸沽新部署
05 Nov 2019, 12:06 by 投資
美團點評 – W（3690）以同股不同權形式掛牌，今早再創上市新高終成為紅底股，股價曾高見100元，若以歷來高位100元計算，美團在今年內累計升幅達1.28倍。最新報97元，跌1.42%。如果有貨在手，最新部署係點？冇貨又入唔入好？！即睇最新追揸沽攻略！
撰文：Smart ED編輯部  ｜ 圖片：中新社
美團股價曾高見100元
同股不同權港股獲納入滬深港通後，相關股份造好。其中美團（3690）續破頂，今早終成為紅底股，股價曾高見100元。信誠證券聯席董事張智威表示，美團最厲害之處在於由2015年至今的收入都每每以雙位數字、甚至以倍數增長，收入非常強勁！另外，其股東應佔溢利雖然之前有過百億虧損，但隨著其收入不斷增加及成本的壓縮，已由原本過百億虧損到現在最新只有5億的虧損。
延伸閱讀：美團點評扭虧為盈 料變「紅底股」｜投資有道


美團點評（3690）以同股不同權形式掛牌，今早終成為紅底股，股價曾高見100元，若以歷來高位100元計算，美團在今年內累計升幅達1.28倍。

美團最新追揸沽攻略
他預計美團業績未來趨勢向好，加上現時大眾都逐漸習慣於網上「叫外賣」服務，張智威認為美團很有機會轉虧為盈。他續指，由於大行對其估值都高於100元以上，所以他認為現階段約96.8元水平價位「可以買入」，目標價為110元。如果已有貨在手，可考慮當股價升至100元以上才逐步沽出，投資者亦可作中線持有，直至美團公布下一期業績時，股價更有機會再升。
宏滙資產管理董事及投資策略總監林嘉麒則表示，雖然美團今日見過100元後回落，但短線再上機會大，有貨可繼續持有。冇貨在手可於93元開始吸納，先看目標108元。

text:
The US group commented that the red stocks saw 100 mosquitoes! Track new deployments
05 Nov 2019, 12:06 by Investment
US Mission Review – W (3690) was listed in the same stock and different rights. This morning, the new high-end stock became a red stock. The stock price was as high as 100 yuan. If the historical high is 100 yuan, the US group will increase in this year. Up to 1.28 times. The latest report was 97 yuan, down 1.42%. If there is goods in hand, what is the latest deployment point? Is it good to pick up the goods? ! That's the latest tracking strategy!
Written by: Smart ED Editorial Department | Photo: China News Service
US stock price has seen 100 yuan high
After the Hong Kong stocks with different rights in the same stock were included in the Shanghai-Shenzhen-Hong Kong Stock Connect, the relevant stocks were completed. Among them, the US Mission (3690) continued to break, and this morning it became a red stock. The stock price was as high as 100 yuan. Zhang Zhiwei, co-director of Xincheng Securities, said that the most powerful thing about the US group is that the income from 2015 to the present has doubled and even multiplied, and the income is very strong! In addition, although its profit attributable to shareholders has had a loss of 10 billion yuan before, with the continuous increase in its income and the compression of costs, it has already suffered losses from the original billions of losses to the latest only 500 million.
Extended reading: US group comments turned losses into profit, changed to "red stocks" | investment has a way


The US group comment (3690) was listed in the form of different rights of the same stock. It became a red stock at the end of the day. The stock price was as high as 100 yuan. If the historical high is 100 yuan, the US group will increase by 1.28 times this year.

US Mission's latest tracking strategy
He expects the future trend of Meituan's performance to be good, and the public is gradually getting used to the online "out-of-sale" service. Zhang Zhiwei believes that the US group has a chance to turn a profit. He continued to point out that since the valuation of the bank is higher than 100 yuan, he believes that the current price level of about 96.8 yuan can be "buy" and the target price is 110 yuan. If you already have the goods in hand, you can consider that when the stock price rises above 100 yuan, it will gradually be released. Investors can also hold the mid-line, until the US group announces the next performance, the stock price has a chance to rise again.
Lin Jiawei, director of Honghui Asset Management and director of investment strategy, said that although the US group saw a drop of 100 yuan today, it will have a chance to continue in the short-term. The goods can be absorbed at the beginning of 93 yuan, first look at the target 108 yuan.
